mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_ID, CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, REPLY_ID, CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM ( SELECT R.REPLY_ID, CONTENT, R.BOARD_ID, R.USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM TBL_REPLY R JOIN TBL_USER U ON R.BOARD_ID = 1 AND R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY R.REPLY_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} + 1 )WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
